Package com.example.application

Class expectedBet

java.lang.Object
com.example.application.expectedBet
public class expectedBet extends Object
Calculates the recommended bet multiplier, recommended bet, and the expected bank balance of the user after a specified number of hands while using the recommended multiplier & bet.

    • calcMultiplier

      public static double calcMultiplier(tech.tablesaw.api.Table simulatedData, int trueCount)
      Calculates the recommended multiplier the user should multiply their bet by given the true count
      Parameters:
      simulatedData - a table of simulated data used for prediciting the outcome of the hand based upon the true count
      trueCount - the true count of cards for the current game
      Returns:
      A recommended multiplier the user should multiply their bet by

    • calcRecBet

      public static int calcRecBet(tech.tablesaw.api.Table simulatedData, int trueCount, int betValue)
      Calculates the recommended bet the user should place using the recommended multiplier
      Parameters:
      simulatedData - a table used for predicting the outcome of the hand based upon the true count
      trueCount - the true count of cards for the current game
      betValue - the constant amount of money the user is betting for each hand
      Returns:
      The recommended bet the user should place for the current hand

    • calcExpBank

      public static double calcExpBank(tech.tablesaw.api.Table simulatedData, double betValue, int hands, int trueCount)
      Parameters:
      simulatedData - a table used for predicting the outcome of the hand based upon the true count
      betValue - the constant amount of money the user is betting for each hand
      hands - the number of hands the user wishes to simulate using the recommended bet
      trueCount - the true count for the current shoe to be used when predicting bankroll
      Returns:
      the simulated bank balance of the user based upon the true count and bet amount
